alert.note: Alert for Marion; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marion and northwestern Winston Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hackleburg, or 9 miles northeast of Hamilton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Haleyville, Hackleburg, Brinn, Weston, Lake Buttahatchee, Needmore, Bear Creek, Natural Bridge, Weiss, Posey Field Airport, Tessner, Pearces Mill, Rankin Fite Airport, Pebble, Upper Bear Creek Reservoir, Pigeye, Delmar and Piney Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
